name: Asociația Producătorilor de Mobilă din România
goal:
As a a professional, autonomous, non-governmental and indifferent to politics organization of the employers from the furniture manufacturing sector and furniture related sectors, such as: raw material; accessories and other materials used in the production process; machines, equipment and technology for woodworking and furniture industry, as well as R&D institutes and educational institutions, APMR represents, promotes and fully supports its members’ economic, technical, industrial, legal and social interests in their relations with the public authorities, Romanian Government and Parliament, trade unions and other state and private organizations both at national and international level.
It acts as the voice of the Romanian furniture manufacturing industry towards the executive and legislative public bodies.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
Participation in the Commission public consultation on Deforestation and forest degradation – stepping up EU action (launched in January 2019)
Participation in the Commission public consultation on the product scope of the EU Timber Regulation (EUTR) (launched in January 2018)
